img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 110.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_Thunderclap_110.jpg)
If he starts to channel energy within himself, watch for light to shine out of his body and electrical threads appear all around. You'll need to quickly sprint away as the very air around him will raise your shock meter, and after a few moments, he'll explode and deal a lethal amount of damage in a very large radius.
img_below_text:
When you finally reach the last third of Yellowbrow's health, he'll again toss you into the air, and this time the Apramana Bat will catch you and fling you around. You'll actually gain the Apramana Bat Spirit during this sequence, and fly right at him only to be knocked to the ground - again taking off a chunk of your health in an unavoidable scene.
In this final phase, Yellowbrow is more likely than ever to summon his giant lighting blast again as he creates motes of lightning all around him, meaning you'll need to race to the far corner or use something like the Wind Tamer to snap him out of it.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 110.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_Thunderclap_110.jpg)
If he starts to channel energy within himself, watch for light to shine out of his body and electrical threads appear all around. You'll need to quickly sprint away as the very air around him will raise your shock meter, and after a few moments, he'll explode and deal a lethal amount of damage in a very large radius."
        - Following Text: "When you finally reach the last third of Yellowbrow's health, he'll again toss you into the air, and this time the Apramana Bat will catch you and fling you around. You'll actually gain the Apramana Bat Spirit during this sequence, and fly right at him only to be knocked to the ground - again taking off a chunk of your health in an unavoidable scene.
In this final phase, Yellowbrow is more likely than ever to summon his giant lighting blast again as he creates motes of lightning all around him, meaning you'll need to race to the far corner or use something like the Wind Tamer to snap him out of it."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic moment in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring a menacing, winged creature suspended in a richly detailed environment with ornate architecture. The creature appears to be taunting the player with the text: "What is best about my Seedsack is how it utterly remakes all who enter!" This scene likely occurs during a boss encounter, emphasizing the creature's power and the perilous nature of the fight. The preceding and following text suggests this is part of an intense sequence involving electrical attacks and unavoidable damage, requiring strategic movement and abilities to survive.
